item.description: Control where to search in the EPG. When 'all bouquets' is set, all bouquets are searched, even if 'Enable multiple bouquets' is disabled.
Sets the default search scope when the user is asked.
Show satellite orbital positions in the search results.
Set type of match used to compare program titles with the search string.
Is the search case-sensitive or case-insensitive?
Enable this to allow access to EPG Search from within the plugin browser.
Maximum number of entries in the search history. Set this to 0 to disable search history.
Choose the encoding type for searches, helpful for foreign languages.
